search_usage: Use the /search command to search for a player. Example: /search nickoehler
length_error: The search query must be between 2 and 32 characters
no_ranked_data: This player has not played any ranked games yet
no_team_data: This player has not played any ranked team games yet
no_clan_data: This player is not in a clan anymore
general_stats: ⚔️ • GENERAL STATS • ⚔️ 🎖 • Clan: {clan} 🆙 • Lv: {level} 🔺 • XP: {xp} ⌚️ • Most used legend: {most_used_legend} ⌛️ • In-game Time: {total_game_time} 🎮 • Games played: {games} 🥇 • Games won: {wins} 🥉 • Games lost: {loses} ⚖️ • Win percentage: {winperc}% 👊 • Total KOs: {totalko} ⚰️ • Total Deaths: {totaldeath} 💀 • Total suicides: {totalsuicide} 😐 • Teammate KOs: {totalteamko} 💣 BOMBS 💣 ├─► KOs: {kobomb} ╰─► Damage: {damagebomb} 💥 MINES 💥 ├─► KOs: {komine} ╰─► Damage: {damagemine} ☀️ SPIKEBALLS ☀️ ├─► KOs: {kospikeball} ╰─► Damage: {damagespikeball} 👟 SIDE KICK 👟 ├─► KOs: {kosidekick} ╰─► Damage: {damagesidekick} ❄️ SNOWBALLS ❄️ ├─► KOs: {kosnowball} ╰─► Hits: {hitsnowball}
ranked_stats: 🏆 • RANKED 1v1 • 🏆 🔶 • Current elo: {rating} 🔷 • Elo peak: {peak} 👑 • Tier: {tier} 🎮 • Games played: {games} 🥇 • Games won: {wins} 🥉 • Games lost: {loses} 🌎 • Region: {region} 💎 • Estimated glory: {glory} 👑 • Estimated elo reset: {elo_reset}
ranked_team_stats: 🏆 • RANKED 2v2 • 🏆 👥 • Team: {teamname} 🔶 • Current elo: {rating} 🔷 • Elo peak: {peak} 👑 • Tier: {tier} 🎮 • Games played: {games} 🥇 • Games won: {wins} 🥉 • Games lost: {loses} 🌎 • Region: {region}
clan_stats: 🆔 • Clan ID: {id} 👑 • Clan name: {name} 📅 • Creation date: {date} 🔺 • Clan XP: {xp} 👥 • Clan members: {num} {current}/{total}
